plugins.name: planr
plugins.description: End-to-end GitHub-based project management from idea capture to deployment. Includes interactive project capture, feature generation, Figma design integration, high-level planning overview, detailed task generation with embedded API specs, implementation with vertical slices, and progress tracking via dashboard.

plugins.name: designr
plugins.description: Figma design workflow: design system setup, screen creation with auto-validation loop, and design validation.

plugins.name: bible-scribe
plugins.description: A scribe for biblical content - worship messages, Bible classes, quizzes, and study materials. Includes scripture research, Christ-centered worship message generation, iterative refinement, and markdown formatting in Malayalam.

plugins.name: design-cache
plugins.description: Design knowledge base MCP server. Ingest UI designs from screenshots or web pages, analyze with Claude Vision, cache structured specs in PostgreSQL + pgvector, and search/retrieve cached designs when building UIs.
